[center][size=16pt]BE SURE YOU PLACE IT AT THE RIGHT PLACE IN ‘client.java’!!![/size]

[/quote]

Probably under the objectClickOne packet.

item.title: [317] How to make you go Up or Down with a ladder? (+ animation) [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pascalrs2 Pascalrs2
item.description:
@Pascalrs2 wrote:

[center]This is the code you need to make you go down with a ladder[/center]

if ((objectID == Object ID) && (objectX == Object X coord) && (objectY == Object Y coord)) {
toX = Your X coord;
toY = Your Y coord;
heightLevel = 0; // Ladder Down
setAnimation(828);
break;
}

[center]This is the code you need to make you go up with a ladder[/center]

if ((objectID == Object ID) && (objectX == Object X coord) && (objectY == Object Y coord)) {
toX = Your X coord;
toY = Your Y coord;
heightLevel = 1; // Ladder Up
setAnimation(828);
break;
}

You can also let you go higher or go underground… Just change the ‘heightLevel’ to the height you want.

[center][size=16pt]BE SURE YOU PLACE IT AT THE RIGHT PLACE IN ‘client.java’!!![/size][/center]

Read full topic
item.source: [317] How to make you go Up or Down with a ladder? (+ animation) [317]
